segment.source: Checklist: Administer the AGPM Server and Archive

segment.source: In Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM), both the AGPM Service and the archive are managed by AGPM Administrators (Full Control).
segment.target: In Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM), both the AGPM Service and the archive are managed by AGPM Administrators (Full Control).

segment.source: The following are typical tasks for an AGPM Administrator.
segment.target: The following are typical tasks for an AGPM Administrator.

segment.source: Frequent Task
segment.target: Frequent Task

segment.source: Reference
segment.target: Reference

segment.source: Delegate access to Group Policy Objects (GPOs) in the archive.
segment.target: Delegate access to Group Policy Objects (GPOs) in the archive.

segment.source: Delegate Domain-Level Access to the Archive
segment.target: Delegate Domain-Level Access to the Archive

segment.source: Delegate Access to an Individual GPO in the Archive
segment.target: Delegate Access to an Individual GPO in the Archive

segment.source: Back up the archive to enable disaster recovery.
segment.target: Back up the archive to enable disaster recovery.

segment.source: Back Up the Archive
segment.target: Back Up the Archive

segment.source: Infrequent Task
segment.target: Infrequent Task

segment.source: Reference
segment.target: Reference

segment.source: Restore the archive from a backup to recover from a disaster.
segment.target: Restore the archive from a backup to recover from a disaster.

segment.source: Restore the Archive from a Backup
segment.target: Restore the Archive from a Backup

segment.source: Move the AGPM Service, the archive, or both to a different server.
segment.target: Move the AGPM Service, the archive, or both to a different server.

segment.source: Move the AGPM Server and the Archive
segment.target: Move the AGPM Server and the Archive

segment.source: Change the archive path, the AGPM Service Account, or the port on which the AGPM Service listens.
segment.target: Change the archive path, the AGPM Service Account, or the port on which the AGPM Service listens.

segment.target: Modify the AGPM Service
